origin_items.wrong_origin: You're unable to understand this item. Maybe %s could.
flavor.origin_items.air_sigill: Your ancestors may have been beings of air but it seems that a brain needs at least some mass to function. While you will never fly freely like them this item allow you to use their power and compact the air under your feet.
flavor.origin_items.arrow_breaker: This contraption pulls energy out of the endless void of the end and creates a protective layer around you. If it is pierced by an arrow, the energy is released and allows you to teleport away.
flavor.origin_items.blazing_molotov: This fiery liquid was once enjoyed as drink by your ancestors. While it is to hot to drink for you, it's volatile nature does make it a useful weapon.
flavor.origin_items.crafting_item: Your connection to your ancestors in crystallized into a colorful gem.
flavor.origin_items.ears: Your ancestors may have had a great sense of hearing but this trait seems to have fallen victim to evolution. Nevertheless do these ears help you feel closer to your ancestors and allow you to complete your feline look
flavor.origin_items.shulker_cannon: This weapon uses the shell of one of your shulker ancestors to condense the energy of the void into a somewhat intelligent bullet. Sometimes the old has to make room for the new.
flavor.origin_items.spider_fangs: Even having lost your ancestors fangs over time, your urge to hunt still remains. This thin blade coated with venom triggers genetically encoded movements and allow you to lunge at your prey like your ancestors.
flavor.origin_items.wing_piercer: Once used by Elytrians to shoot their winged enemies out of the sky, this antique one-handed Weapon design has also proven fairly effective against flightless foes.
description.origin_items.air_sigill: Allows you to walk on air as if it was solid.
description.origin_items.arrow_breaker: Allows you to dodge arrows like your ancestors.
description.origin_items.blazing_molotov: Bursts into a fiery explosion when thrown. Handle with care.
description.origin_items.ears: Your questionable looks invoke a nauseating feeling in any observers.
description.origin_items.shulker_cannon: Shoots a slow moving bullet, which targets the entity aimed at.
description.origin_items.spider_fangs: Lets you lunge forward like your ancestors and poisons your prey
description.origin_items.wing_piercer: Harnesses the speed of the wielder against it's target. It's reload time has been improved to benefit an aerial combat style.
text.config.origin_items_config.title: Origin Items - changes require restart
